channel.title: ScanX – Global
channel.description: Auto-generated feed for ScanX Global news

item.title: China Implements Export Licensing Requirements for Select Steel Products
item.description: Top News China Implements Export Licensing Requirements for Select Steel Products 3 hours ago China has announced new export licensing requirements for certain steel products, effective January 1. This regulatory measure introduces administrative controls over steel exports, marking a significant shift in China's steel industry trade policy. The new system requires exporters to obtain authorization before shipping affected steel categories internationally. This change may impact global steel markets and supply chains, with potential implications for countries relying on Chinese steel imports.

item.title: Tata Power Issues ₹2,000 Crore Non-Convertible Debentures on Private Placement Basis
item.description: Tata Power Issues ₹2,000 Crore Non-Convertible Debentures on Private Placement Basis 2 minutes ago Tata Power announces ₹2,000.00 crore NCD issuance through private placement, comprising 2,00,000 debentures with ₹1,00,000.00 face value each. The unsecured NCDs feature two series with 3-year and 5-year maturity options, bullet repayment structure, and AA/Stable credit ratings. The debentures will be listed on BSE debt segment with deemed allotment date of December 19, 2025.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 2 hours ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: A-1 Limited Signs Supply Deal for Nitric Acid
item.description: A-1 Limited Signs Supply Deal for Nitric Acid 15 minutes ago A-1 Limited has entered into a strategic tri-partite supply arrangement for Concentrated Nitric Acid involving GNFC as manufacturer and Solar Industries as end user. The deal covers 10,000 metric tonnes from November 2025 to March 2026, enhancing the company's position in specialty chemicals distribution and providing volume visibility through partnerships with nationally reputed corporates.
